name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of experience, I am proficient in **Python**, **Django**, and **AWS** while leveraging my strong skills in **CI/CD** practices and **API** design and development. I excel in building efficient and scalable applications, utilizing modern architecture principles and automation strategies to enhance productivity and ensure observability. My leadership abilities extend to mentoring junior developers and facilitating Agile methodologies to streamline project workflows.
I have a proven track record in developing high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors, integrating key technologies, including **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. My deep cloud expertise spans **Azure**, enabling me to create secure applications compliant with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have hands-on experience in developing and deploying machine learning models in production, implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**, thus ensuring the delivery of intelligent and automated solutions.
